title: Anivia Damage is way down
body: I am a one trick pony anivia, and even when I go 8 and 0 and get a good start. My damage is about half of what it used to be. Support zyra and brand always outdamage me. Other midlaners do more damage if I am not way ahead. It is very rare I get over 40k damage dealt even in maxed out items. Please fix this Riot.

replies.body: dmg isnt everything in this game, zone them you have a decent ult and a wall. You have burst between ur q and E brand and zyra have consistent dmg with plants and brand with burning aoe dots.
Im pretty sure that might be you fam... i play alot of support anivia and normally breach 50-60k easily
Have you tried using your spells?
i have over 3k games on anivia so its definitely not my knowing the champ
